changeSet.author: Sydney
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO public.product (id, "code","name", description, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date) VALUES(nextval('product_id_seq'::regclass), 'goX', 'goX 3 Seater', '3 seater only hand luggage', 'Sydney', now(), null, null);

INSERT INTO public.vehicle (id, registration_number, year_registered, vin_number, make, model, color, seat_capacity, clock_mileage, product_type_id, date_approved, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date) VALUES(nextval('vehicle_id_seq'::regclass), 'DS12GP', 2017, '23424/23423/232', 'Toyota', 'Corolla', 'White', 3, 12000, (select id from public.product where code = 'goX'), now(), 'Sydney', now(), null, null);
